name: Terrific Scientific / Art Explorers
organization_note: Terrific Scientific and Art Explorers are run by the same organization. Registration is unified under 'ArtExplorersTerrificScientific' on ACTIVE.

data_hints.pricing_location: Summer camps page has multi-session discount ($10 off per camp) and multi-sibling discount ($10). Specific camp prices on grade-level pages
data_hints.extended_care: Aftercare available 3:30-5pm, $12/day, must register in advance. Late fees $1/minute past 5pm
data_hints.location: Vieja Valley School, 434 Nogal Dr. Santa Barbara, CA 93110

program_details.total_camps: 65 different camps - largest array in Santa Barbara County
program_details.focus: STEAM - Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, and Math
program_details.curriculum: Discovery-based learning, hands-on experiments, team activities, robotics

daily_schedule.9:00-10:30: Specific Camp Activities (Tribes Activity, Project Time)

lunch_provider.name: Nu Cuisine
lunch_provider.note: Healthy, organic, vegetarian option, all made from scratch. State of CA certified.

cancellation_policy.2/9-2/28: $25 cancellation fee, balance refunded to card
cancellation_policy.3/1-4/15: $50 cancellation fee per camp, balance refunded to card
cancellation_policy.4/16-5/31: $50 cancellation fee per camp, balance to ACTIVE credit (2 year expiry)
cancellation_policy.6/1-8/5: No refunds or credits. Transfer possible with $25 admin fee if space available

policies.no_nuts: Nut-free environment - no nuts or peanut butter allowed
policies.covid: Masks currently not required but may be reinstated based on conditions

special_notes: Site type: Nonprofit educational organization. WordPress site with straightforward navigation. Uses ACTIVE Network for registration (same platform as many SB camps). 65 different STEAM camps - largest variety in Santa Barbara County. Strong emphasis on behavioral expectations and Tribes Education anti-bullying program. Detailed policies and procedures on summer camps page.
scraping_challenges: Some pages use HTTP (not HTTPS) links
Grade-level camp pages have individual pricing and schedules
